    Michele Usuelli

    Passionate about shaping and delivering AI applications and digital transformations while empowering Data Scientists and other professionals. Enthusiastic early adopter in the field: I have authored two data science books and have experience in research, development, solution architecture, and people management. Disclaimer: I am currently working at Microsoft as a Principal Data Science Manager. The views expressed here are my own and do not necessarily reflect the views of my employer.
